bool MP4SchmAtom::SetSchemeURI (  char *  uri  )  [virtual]
 

Set scheme URI (null terminated string).

If scheme URI already exists, it must be removed and replaced with a newly created one. Data representing scheme URI must be locally copied.

Returns:
Boolean indicating success or not.
